Text:
Thanks (as always) for providing the world with our rugby fix.

Unfortunately, I can't play these files - despite using a wide variety of media players.
A number of players failed to play these files but vlc seems to work.But the quality is horrible for 1.5gb.Thank you anyway shemyaza.
Aspect ratio is wrong and interlaced. its horrible , but thanks i guess you just up them

in VLC , right click on the video. 
Select Video -> Aspect ratio -> 4:3

Select Video -> Deinterlace -> on

Select Video -> Deinterlace mode -> Blend

looks like analog tv but better than before

Great upload! Thanks for me rugby fix! :)

Anyone knows the name of the song that plays at end of file 1 and the begging and the end of the file 2? The instrumental one? Thanks!
